column4: This says ubuntu 32-bit is "certified" for thinkpad t520, but nothing about 64-bit.  What would I lose by installing 32-bit instead of 64-bit?
how much memory is in your laptop
why not try a live USB stick
I don't want to "try", I want ot upgrade... I just want a bailout option.  Is there any actual problem with dual-booting?
